Name: phosphorus pentachloride production | phosphorus pentachloride | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: This dataset includes a method of producing phosphorous pentachloride out of phosphorous trichloride and chlorine. Temperature in the autoclave reactor: 180 - 220 Â°C; pressure: 5-6 bar. PCL3 conversion is 93.9%.
